summary: Samsung is a huge South Korean company with many different businesses. It was started in 1938 by Lee Byung-chul and has grown into one of the world's most valuable brands. Samsung makes lots of things, like electronics, ships, and insurance. After Lee died, the company split into five groups, but they still work together. Some of Samsung's biggest companies are Samsung Electronics, which makes phones and computers, and Samsung Heavy Industries, which builds ships. Samsung is known for its technology and is a big part of South Korea's economy.
title: Samsung
